name: War The Game
description:
War The Game is a strategy war game designed for two players. Destroy the headquarter or all movable units to win the game.

Unique gameplay where the strategy over luck is essential to win the game. Use your resources wisely, build your tactics around the rolled dice points for attacks and defences. Use the board cells to get high defensive strength.

Rules are explained in the embedded rules document.

Randomly generated board for each individual games you play with your friends on one device or via game center.
